item.title: Dapple 1.0.10 Released
item.description: Dapple 1.0.10 has been released. This hotfix release provides a few bugfixes found after the release of 1.0.8.

item.title: Dapple 1.0.8 Released
item.description: Dapple 1.0.8 has been released. This release provides a couple of bug fixes and new features. Most notable is an enhancement to the server tree inside Dapple to give better visual feedback and un-clutter the tree view when browsing very large catalogs. With this change Dapple can scale to 100's of thousands of layers in this view without encumbering the interface.

item.title: Dapple 1.0.6 Released
item.description: Dapple 1.0.6 has been released. This maintenance release addresses a number of bugs found after the intial release, improved metadata support for DAP and WMS servers as well as Windows 2000 support in the install.

item.title: Dapple 1.0.4 Released
item.description: Dapple 1.0.4 has been released. This is the first public release of the Dapple project.
